citations.narrative:
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 4:10 - 4:35 pm on 06/08/2016. Two calls to facility
representative - one from construction person on-site, the second from the inspector -- were unanswered.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property:  Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 4:10 - 4:35 pm on 06/08/2016. Two calls to facility
representative - one from construction person on-site, the second from the inspector -- were unanswered.
